CustomField.formula: IF(text(Resource__r.Project__r.Phase__c) = 'Requirements/Design' || text(Resource__r.Project__r.Phase__c) = 'Build/Test/Sprint Release' || text(Resource__r.Project__r.Phase__c) = 'Gate 2 - Design/LOE Assessment' || text(Resource__r.Project__r.Phase__c) = 'Gate 3 - Launch Readiness', true, false)
CustomField.label: CapEx
